programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar visits Tijuana, Mexico, to team up with volunteers from United Hope for Animals, an organization that rescues dogs and finds them U.S. homes; a cocker spaniel taunts her owner.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A golden retriever mix with canine aggression; a bearded collie who barks, howls and scratches at her owner's boyfriend's guitar; a Lhasa apso/Cavalier Kind Charles Spaniel with canine aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to restore peace at an apartment complex where the residents' dogs do not get along; a family has trouble controlling its three dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An American Eskimo dog attacks doors and windows whenever people pass; a shiba inu overprotects his corgi playmate; two bulldogs are aggressive.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps the owner of a grooming business deal with difficult canine clients; a Chihuahua has a barking problem.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A border collie is overprotective of his owner; a German shepherd is aggressive toward other dogs and people.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd/pit bull mix with severe aggression issues; a boxer's owners are concerned by her tendency to jump the six-foot backyard fence.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a man get over a fear of dogs so he can finally fulfill his children's request to adopt one of their own.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.sub-title: My Life on the Dog List
programme.desc: Cesar helps actor and comedian Kathy Griffin with her two rescue dogs, Chance and Pom Pom, who are disobedient and territorial.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two troubled dogs, and their families, win sessions with Cesar after auditioning at a pet store in Orange County, Calif.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Doberman/Lab and a pit bull develop behavioral issues after not being walked for months; an Italian greyhound acts aggressively toward the men of the house.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Dave Glassman adopts pit bulls Blackjack and Memphis together, but one day during a barking fit, the two dogs turn on each other.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar works to dial down the bad behaviors of four problem dogs who won sessions at the PETCO auditions.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar celebrates the show's 100th episode with a grand reunion of many of the past guests and their dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Daschund Lotus is very territorial; his aggression sends his owner Chari to the hospital; Cesar makes a house call to see Joey, a German Shepard who is territorial over the second story of his owner's home.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A French bulldog is nervous around other dogs and occasionally nips at people; a Vizsla who resists going outside due to her fear of cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Expert Cesar Millan rehabilitates dogs with behavioral issues.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a newlywed couple whose dogs don't let them get close and another pair who met online and are nervous about introducing their dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a newlywed couple whose dogs don't let them get close and another pair who met online and are nervous about introducing their dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A feral dog refuses to be caught; the addition of an English bulldog disrupts the harmonious relationship of a boxer and a cocker spaniel; a pit bull terrier refuses to go for walks.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull/chow mix has an extreme fear of the stove; a Rottweiler and a German shepherd battle for control; a Jack Russell terrier cannot handle the loss of its pack leader.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A family's new Great Dane moves in on its other dog's territory; Cesar helps Los Angeles' animal-control department with its new pet-ownership program.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: TV personality Ed McMahon has an aggressive wheaten terrier; a beagle does not leave the house; an Australian shepherd is so territorial no one has visited his home in years.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A widow's retriever mix and two fox terriers do not get along; a Shar-Pei/Doberman mix drools excessively on car rides; Cesar revisits a Rottweiler mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: After a 45-day stint in Iraq and two hurricanes, an explosive-sniffing ATF Labrador retriever begins exhibiting severe symptoms of terror.
